short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts a given Advent of Code page to a GitHub-compatible Markdown file.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily generate markdown from an Advent of Code problem description. Simply activate the extension to generate markdown from the current page and save it to a file.
